summary: AN ORDINANCE authorizing an agreement for the lease of office space to be used for municipal purposes in the Old Public Safety Building, located at 400 Yesler Way, Seattle, in the maximum amount of 103,620 square feet at an annual rental of no more than $657,600.00 pursuant to specifications for the remodeling and use thereof and conditioned upon those certain separate agreements with the owner relating to payment of moving costs to accomplish City of Seattle occupancy and an annual refund of portions of the rent payment therefor;
committee: Parks and Public Grounds and Finance
